wikipedia_page.main: Billy Cole (born 10 February 1965) is a male British former track and field athlete who specialised in the shot put. His personal best for the event was 19.01 m (62 ft 4+1⁄4 in). His sole major achievement was a gold medal at the 1986 Commonwealth Games. He also won three UK Championships and four AAA titles (two outdoor, two indoor)
